email.body:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Zoom <teamzoom@e.zoom.us>
Date: Wed, Sep 17, 2025 at 5:19 AM
Subject: Annual notice about Zoom’s rules and regulations of service
To: <cr7yeswanth@gmail.com>


As an admin or owner of a Zoom account, we are reaching out to you to share
information regarding Zoom’s rules and regulations governing the usage of
Zoom services, as required by Indian law.

[image: Zoom]
<https://click.e.zoom.us/?qs=bed24f0119de2ca60f7f7b98e9fd6d66cb81356e5630e63446ea88b5e3397a8ddf02f39a49c44d5da71b42d72dd73ea6f3ae3750d670ad9b5d736017d7f6b720>
Dear Valued Customer,

As an admin or owner of a Zoom account, we are reaching out to you to share
information regarding Zoom’s rules and regulations governing the usage of
Zoom services, as required by Indian law. Please be sure to forward this
email to all users on your account, as they are also expected to abide by
Zoom’s policies.

*Here are the relevant rules and terms:*

   - Terms of Service
   <https://click.e.zoom.us/?qs=bed24f0119de2ca6687e9e9869b0291cd00bb5f33b2fb1662c9921905c3b481b6b998345499122ab45ba1bb23a3c8b4f8206633e66e3a5a9c44651460a27f28f>
   - Privacy Statement
   <https://click.e.zoom.us/?qs=bed24f0119de2ca6a67063b5e77cb439da8312ffd2122bdec4fa8b748b21ecaac7e9eaa54b29fd5a1785c0ff5baced6ff1c9d5074ec79bf7fedaaefb9b13ff9a>
   - Acceptable Use Guidelines
   <https://click.e.zoom.us/?qs=bed24f0119de2ca63758b112d1da60b9f1aefef33e8cadbe2c4493ef38008bde51badf630ba4d47dcf17e412fed93b3b0e8a0c18a555b3f83989411d73601ef4>
   - Other rules and resources available at Trust Center
   <https://click.e.zoom.us/?qs=bed24f0119de2ca69e3594cde1719c6f23a8fcf0ede19e161c11ee310a18d71dbb585926c35940617298a34b0211336bbb4511467c503514e21a5987bb70ed8a>

Please read these rules and regulations carefully and ensure that all users
on your account abide by them. Zoom reserves the right to terminate the
access or usage rights of users who do not comply with these rules and
regulations.

Thank you for choosing Zoom to stay connected.

Team Zoom

You received this mandatory email announcement as an annual notice about
the rules and regulations governing the usage of Zoom services and
consequences of non-compliance.

Catch us on social
